sense.gloss: flute, fife, pipe, recorder, flageolet, shakuhachi, clarinet
horn (instrument; made of animal horn), bugle, hunting horn
magic flute, The Magic Flute (by Mozart)
winter wind whistling through a bamboo fence
Edo-period mouth harp (with a hairpin-like frame and a long straight tongue)

r_ele.r: あきのしかはふえによる

sense.gloss: people may bring about their demise for love, it is easy to have one's weak points taken advantage of, in autumn (during mating season), deer come forth when they hear (a hunter's) whistle
star snapper (species of fish, Lutjanus stellatus)
spotstripe snapper (species of fish, Lutjanus ophuysenii)
